sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../App.css'; import hotels from '../data'; const HotelDetail = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const hotel = hotels.find(hotel => hotel.id === parseInt(id)); return ( <>

{hotel.name}

{hotel.location}

Location: {hotel.location}

Local category: {hotel.rating}

Price per night: {hotel.price}

Description:

{hotel.description}

); } export default HotelDetail;
